title: Winnie the Pooh and Tigger too
creator_credit: Walt Disney Productions, Wolfgang Reitherman and John Lounsbery
brief_description: Rambunctious Tigger bounces his way through this film, leaving a trail of laughter and enjoyment behind him. Poor Rabbit, driven to distraction by Tigger’s high spirits plots a “calming sort of lesson”. Narrated by Sebastian Cabot.
creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Productions, Wolfgang Reitherman and John Lounsbery
